summary: The Protect America's Workforce Act (H.R. 2550) nullifies an Executive Order issued on March 27, 2025, that concerns exclusions from Federal Labor-Management Relations Programs. The bill mandates that this Executive Order has no force, prohibiting the use of federal funds to implement it. Furthermore, it affirms the validity and continued force of existing collective bargaining agreements between executive branch agencies and labor unions, ensuring they remain in effect through their terms.
